metadata.description:
Sergeant John Wilson, World War II soldier, is willing to give up his life
in service of his country... but life, and death, have other plans for him!

Inducted into a secret government experiment to create an American
super-soldier through magical means, he finds himself drawn into a cold war
between Heaven and Hell, with Earth -- and every conflict of the last
seventy years -- as their battleground!

Can one man, however empowered, hope to prevail against such odds?
metadata.name: A1: Odyssey
